  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/632</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/632</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els sòlids fan pressió</string>
            <string language="en">Solids exert pressure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körper wenden Druck an</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les solides exercent la pression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os sólidos exercem a pressão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I solidi impiegano la pressione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα στερεά ασκούν την πίεση</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva amb tres apartats: la força i la superfície, la pressió i aplicacions pràctiques. Té activitats d'autoavaluació (Avalua't) i una proposta pràctica (Practica) per tal de calcular la pressió que es fa sobre terra.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) with three sections: force and surface, pressure, and practical applications. It includes self-assessment activities and a practical exercise to calculate the pressure you exert on the ground.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mecànica (física)</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics (physics)</string>
            <string language="es">mecánica (física)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen físic</string>
            <string language="en">physical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) mit drei Kapiteln: Kraft und Oberfläche, Druck und 
praktische Anwendungen. Er schließt Selbstbewertung 
Aktivitäten und eine praktische Übung ein, um den Druck zu 
errechnen, den Sie aus den Grund anwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) 
avec trois sections : force et surface, pression, et 
applications pratiques. Elle inclut des activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment et un exercice pratique pour calculer la pression 
que vous exercez sur la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) com 
três seções: força e superfície, pressão, e aplicações 
práticas. Inclui atividades do self-assessment e um exercício 
prático para calcular a pressão que você exerce na terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) con 
tre sezioni: forza e superficie, pressione ed applicazioni 
pratiche. Include le attività di valutazione di se stesso e 
un'esercitazione pratica per calcolare la pressione che impiegate 
sulla terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) με τρία 
τμήματα: δύναμη και επιφάνεια, πίεση, και πρακτικές 
εφαρμογές. Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης 
και μια πρακτική άσκηση για να υπολογίσει την πίεση που ασκείτε 
στο έδαφος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker (Physik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique (physique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos (física)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici (fisica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno fisico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί (φυσική)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
